entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
